item.title: About
item.description: Who I am: I am a programmer with an interest solving interesting problems and learning new things. What I do: I used to work in health care while teaching myself programming because I found automating tedious tasks interesting. I decided to go back to university to get more formal training in the field, so I am now a Computer Science student at Southeastern Louisiana University. Projects Remedy A Discord bot made with Nostrum for playing audio from various sources (e.
